revised_title: Protozoa in Sick Soils and the Life Cycle of a Flagellate Monad
tldr: The author examines protozoa from sick soils and focuses on the life cycle of a flagellate monad. They describe the behavior and characteristics of the flagellate, including its trophic form, flagellum, and reproduction process. The author suggests that these protozoa may play a role in causing soil sickness and that further research is needed to understand their impact on soil health.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Soil Biology
